synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involved weighing lithium sulfide, diphosphorus pentasulfide, lithium bromide, and iodine, placing them in a container with dehydrated toluene, sealing it, ball milling the mixture for 40 hours at 500 rpm to create a sulfide-based solid electrolyte, precipitating the powder in dehydrated toluene, removing the solvent, and drying the powder at 80Â°C to obtain an amorphous sulfide-based solid electrolyte.
